title: Kamisama to Unmei Kakumei no Paradox
original_name: 神様と運命革命のパラドックス
sinopse: Kagurazaka Renya has terrible luck with lotteries. One day, to his surprise, he wins first prize and becomes a god. Along with seven angels that work to support him, he is charged with fulfilling people's wishes and changing their destinies.
